I suspect something strange in your install. We have been working this way for 
at least a week with no problem.  

Which VM are you using?

try 1122g

Also note that we have seen intermittent problems with NoClassDefFound errors. 
Switching to another VM (sun, ibm, ...) may fix your problem.  Also, I hate to 
say it but I've found that rebooting or clearing the disk cache sometime fixes 
these problems.

i thought you actually _had_ to run it with sidecar
will try something else

Closing.
Please re-open if you see this behaviour in the latest builds.
